item.description:
I've received word that our fellow Wingman, Anton, is doing a DJ show at Tapas in Hartford on Friday night. I know we have the Boyz II Men meetup planned, but for those that want to stay a little closer to home, this should be fun. Anton, feel free to correct any details.

 

The facebook page says it starts at 9pm, and it says that the cover is $5 before 10pm, so let's plan to meet at 9pm and this will allow for all the late-comers that we always have. Call/text if you have any questions. My cell is 716-307-6590. -Jocelyn
item.name: Night Out - Drinks and Dancing - Improv DJing @ Tapas with Pav-Lov & DJ Unbound
